WorkItem.ClosedComment: Looks like this has been fixed in newer builds. Please reactivate if this repros for you on latest sources from the develop branch (or on the next release)
WorkItem.Description:
I've passed some js code from http://jsfiddle.net into my Visual Studio ts file, then it stopped compiling.
Therefore I've investigated problem and found out that in case when encoding is set to
UTF-8 Unicode (with BOM) text, with CRLF line terminators
tsc compiles without any warning into empty js file.
WorkItem.Summary: tsc generates empty output for some UTF8 files
